name: AI-Powered Email Inbox Manager with GPT-4, Gmail, and Slack Integration

user.name: Muhammad Bello
user.bio:
I‚Äôm Muhammad,
 
I focus on solving real business problems, not just systems, because a lot of them struggle with Repetitive manual tasks, Delayed responses, and Onboarding taking too long. My aim is to help them save time and make money.

description:
## Email Inbox Manager System

### Categories 

- Email Automation
 
- AI-Powered Operations
 
- Internal Productivity Tools

This workflow builds a fully automated AI-powered email categorization and response assistant. It intelligently processes, categorizes, labels, and drafts replies to incoming Gmail messages in real time using AI with zero manual involvement. Perfect for support, sales, finance, and internal operations.


### Benefits

- **Automated Email Triage** ‚Äì Every unread email is instantly read, analyzed, and classified

- **AI-Powered Categorization** ‚Äì Uses GPT-4 to understand content and apply correct labels
 
- **Smart Response Generation** ‚Äì Automatically drafts accurate replies based on category
 
- **Slack Notifications** ‚Äì Instantly notifies your team about internal or sales-related messages
 
- **Seamless Gmail Integration** ‚Äì Labels, drafts, and marks emails directly in your inbox
 
- **Custom Classification Rules** ‚Äì Tailored to internal, support, sales, finance, and promotional needs

### How It Works

**Gmail Trigger:**

- Monitors Gmail inbox in real-time for new **unread** messages

- Triggers the workflow every minute with no need for manual refresh

**Smart Classification:**

- Feeds email body to AI-powered **Text Classifier**

- Categories include: Internal, Customer Support, Promotions, Admin/Finance, and Sales Opportunity

- Classification based on sender domain, keywords, and context

**AI-Based Labeling:**

- Applies appropriate Gmail label based on classification result

- Helps keep inbox clean, organized, and easily searchable

**AI Reply Generation:**

- Specialized GPT-4 agents generate replies tailored to each category:

- **Internal:** Polished team replies

- **Customer Support:** Clear and professional customer responses

- **Promotions:** Summarizes and evaluates promotional value

- **Admin/Finance:** Extracts invoice/payment information

- **Sales Opportunity:** Drafts personalized replies and sales notifications

**Auto-Drafting + Slack Alerts:**

- Replies are saved as Gmail drafts, ready for review or direct send

- Sends Slack notifications for Internal or Sales Opportunities

- Includes subject lines and quick message previews

**Smart Decision-Making:**

- Promotional emails are evaluated with AI for usefulness

- Only valuable offers are flagged or responded to

- Automatically marks emails as read after processing

### Business Use Cases

- **Customer Support Teams** ‚Äì Automatically categorize and prep replies to client messages

- **Sales Reps** ‚Äì Instantly receive drafted responses to new inquiries

- **Operations Managers** ‚Äì Keep internal comms clear and responsive

- **Finance Departments** ‚Äì Auto-extract and review payment/invoice messages

- **Founders** ‚Äì Never miss an important email while your AI sorts and replies for you


**Difficulty Level:** Intermediate
**Estimated Build Time:** 2‚Äì4 hours

**Monthly Operating Cost:** $20‚Äì80 (depending on OpenAI usage and Slack volume)

### Required Setup
1. Gmail Integration 
3. Set up Gmail OAuth2 connection
5. Create labels: Internal, Customer Support, Promotions, Admin/Finance, Sales Opportunity
7. OpenAI Integration
9. Connect GPT-4 or GPT-4o account
11. Configure role-based prompts for each email category
13. Output structured response data (subject, body, notification)
15. Slack Integration
17. Set up Slack OAuth2 connection
19. Configure target Slack channel


Notify team when important categories are triggered

### System Architecture
The workflow follows a powerful 6-stage automation:

**Trigger** ‚Äì Poll Gmail for new unread emails

**Classify** ‚Äì AI categorizes the email into the right bucket

**Label** ‚Äì Applies Gmail label for search and visibility

**Generate Reply** ‚Äì GPT-4 crafts draft email reply

**Draft Email** ‚Äì Saves response in Gmail

**Notify** ‚Äì Optional Slack message alerts for priority emails

### Why This System Works
**Inbox Clarity** ‚Äì Keeps your inbox categorized and organized

**Human Quality Replies** ‚Äì AI-generated messages sound professional and personalized

**Time-Saving Automation** ‚Äì Handles support, sales, internal ops, and finance without touching your inbox

**Multi-Agent Architecture** ‚Äì Each email type is handled by a specialized GPT-4 prompt

**Real Time Reactions** ‚Äì From email receipt to Slack notification in under a minute

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

categories.description:
=Emails from the parent domain (prvndigital.com) from employees. Keywords: request, inquiry,
support, question, follow-up, feedback

=Emails related to ongoing communication with current clients or customers, including service
requests, feedback, support tickets, and inquiries. Keywords: request, inquiry, support, question,
follow-up, feedback

=Emails related to marketing campaigns, promotional offers, newsletters, or business updates
from partners. Typically these emails contain content aimed at engaging an audience or
updating them on promotions. Keywords: newsletter, promotion, offer, sale, campaign,
marketing, launch

=Emails related to admin or financial matters, such as invoices, billing statements, payment
reminders, or expense reports. Anything involving transactions or accounting should fall under
this label. Keywords: invoice, payment, billing, receipt, financial, expense, account
=Emails related to sales. These could include service inquiries, pricing requests, referrals etc.

=You are the Promotions Analyst in an AI email management system.
Your role is to review incoming promotional emails, summarize the offer, and decide whether it‚Äôs
worth pursuing further.
Input:
{{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}
Output:
‚Ä¢ Summary ‚Äì What is being offered?
‚Ä¢ Recommendation ‚Äì Is this worth exploring further? (Yes/No + brief reason)

=You are an executive assistant handling internal emails from my team.
Respond to high-priority emails with clarity and accuracy.
Input:
{{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}
Output:
‚Ä¢ Subject
‚Ä¢ Message

=You are a customer service representative.
Respond to customer inquiries clearly and accurately.
If the request is outside your scope, direct the user to: support@prvndigital.com
Input:
{{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}
Output:
‚Ä¢ Subject
‚Ä¢ Message

=You are a Finance & Billing Assistant.
Review incoming emails related to payments, invoices, or account charges. Summarize the key
details clearly and concisely.
Input:
{{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}
Output:
‚Ä¢ Subject
‚Ä¢ Summary

=Your job is to read incoming emails related to the sale of our products or services and draft a
concise, professional response. Include relevant details such as the contact‚Äôs name, email,
phone number, and any specific questions or requests they mentioned.
Input:
{{ $('Gmail Trigger').item.json.text }}
Output:
‚Ä¢ Subject ‚Äì Appropriate subject line for your reply
‚Ä¢ Message ‚Äì Drafted email response including relevant details
- Notification - create a concise notification to be sent to a slack channel with the first line as
"New Sales Opportunity" along with any relevant details

parameters.content:
## AI-Powered Email Inbox Manager 

This automation system intelligently handles your Gmail inbox using OpenAI and Slack to classify, label, respond to, and manage emails all without human input.

**Gmail Trigger**

-Checks Gmail every 1 minute

-Filters for only UNREAD emails

-Triggers the entire workflow pipeline

-Ensures you're always processing fresh, unseen messages

**Text Classifier**

Powered by GPT-4 to analyzes email text and assigns one of 5 categories:

Internal ‚Äì Team messages from company domain

Customer Support ‚Äì Inquiries, issues, or feedback

Promotions ‚Äì Campaigns, newsletters, sales

Admin/Finance - Invoices, payments, financial info

Sales Opportunity - Potential clients, pricing requests, referrals

---Provides context aware categorization not just keyword-based

**GPT-4 Support Node**

-Enhances classifier accuracy

-Handles classification logic and reasoning

-Ensures consistent results over time

**Gmail Labeling Nodes (x5)**

-Applies the correct Gmail label depending on the classification

-Keeps your inbox clean, organized, and filterable

-Example: A customer complaint is instantly tagged under "Customer Support"

**OpenAI Reply Generation (x5)**

Each category has its own custom GPT-4 prompt:

Internal: Replies on behalf of exec assistant

Customer Support: Friendly and clear client service

Promotions: Summarizes the offer, evaluates usefulness

Finance: Extracts payment/invoice summaries

Sales: Drafts responses, includes lead details + Slack alert

**Draft Responses in Gmail**

-GPT-4 outputs are saved as draft emails

-Ready for your review or auto-send

-Replies are well-formatted, concise, and personalized

**Slack Notifications**

Notifies your team on Slack when:

-A new sales opportunity arrives

-A high-priority internal message comes in

-Boosts real-time awareness without inbox monitoring

**Promotion Filter Logic**

-GPT analyzes if a promo email is worth acting on

-If not valuable, it‚Äôs marked as read and ignored

-Reduces inbox noise without missing opportunities
